name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience delivering high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial industries. Expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **React** alongside **Node.js** for both frontend and backend development. Proven experience with **CI/CD** practices using **CircleCI**, leveraging **Git** for version control and collaboration in an **Agile**, **Kanban**, and **Scrum** environment.

Strong background in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and using **Terraform** for infrastructure as code. Skilled in utilizing databases such as **Postgres**, **DynamoDB**, and **Redis** for data management. Demonstrated ability to develop and test applications utilizing frameworks like **Jest** and **Vitest**, ensuring high-quality code delivery. 

Excel in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Adept in building AI/ML-powered platforms, employing tools for MLOps, including model serving and orchestration through **MLflow** and **Airflow**. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, fostering collaboration across teams.
